Text: FW Important Project Announcements from the Center for the Advancement of Energy MarketsCalifornia Electricity Crisis has resulted in an avalanche of opportunity for the Center for the Advancement of Energy Markets CAEM to provide its views on energy restructuring Below you will find links to some of our recent documents In May CAEM issued an update to the RED Index that now includes the provinces and territories of Canada The RED Index is a scorecard which evaluates and reports on the progress states are making in electricity restructuring Link redindexhtm USA Today did a full page spread using CAEMs RED Index to give a summary of activity in the top states Link moneyconsumerenergyfullhtm The Governor of Pennsylvania included the RED Index Rank of Pennsylvania in his StateoftheState Address Link newsPAGovernorPressReleasePDF The NY PSC issued a Press Release on the RED Index Link newsNYPressReleasepdf CAEM is pleased to announce the formation of a publicprivate sector project called the Distributed Energy Task Force At the request of important members of Congress CAEM will be assessing opportunities for promotion of distributed energy technologies and matching those opportunities with policy instruments ie tax incentives funds for RD etc For a copy of the project description and participation information email a request to In February CAEM sponsored a meeting of the newly formed Leadership Council on Energy Restructuring an umbrella group of industry executives and public sector officials who support the development of a coherent strategy on energy restructuring Link In April CAEM filed comments with the FTC on the proceeding that was initiated at the request of House Energy and Commerce Committee Chairman Billy Tauzin on the impact of States restructuring Link In March CAEM held its first meeting of the DISCO of the Future Forum We have posted several documents from that Forum Link discoofthefuturehtm Last Sunday the Philadelphia Inquirer published the views of CAEM on President Bushs Energy Plan Link contentinquireropinionMALLOYhtmtempl ateaprinthtm In January CAEM appeared on CNN to discuss the California Crisis Note Open your web browser before clicking on this link You will need RealPlayer or Windows Media Player to view file videousmbpowerderegcnnrmramembedtru e Feel free to forward this email to colleagues who may be interested in the Centers activities For other information and documents please visit our website at Please let us know if we can be of assistance to you in your efforts on energy restructuring If you do not wish to receive updates on CAEMs Activity please reply with the word remove in the subject line Thank you Ken Malloy President Center for the Advancement of Energy Markets F Burke Center Parkway PMB Burke VA o f e w

Important Project Announcements from the Center for the Advancement of Energy MarketsThe California Electricity Crisis has resulted in an avalanche of opportunity for the Center for the Advancement of Energy Markets CAEM to provide its views on energy restructuring Below you will find links to so me of our recent documents In May CAEM issued an update to the RED Index thatnow includes the provinces and territories of Canada The RED Index is a scorecard on the progress states are making in electricity restructuring RED Index Update for CanadaUSA Today did a full page spread using CAEMs RED Index to give a summary of activity in the top states USA Today Article The Governo r of Pennsylvania included the RED Index Rank of Pennsylvania in his StateoftheState Address Pennsylvania Governor The NY PSC issued a Pres s Release on the RED Index NY Commission CAEM is pleased to announce the formation of a publicprivate sector projec t called the Distributed Energy Task Force At the request of important membe rs of Congress CAEM will be assessing opportunities for promotion of distributed energy technologies and matching those opportunities with poli cy instruments ie tax incentives funds for RD etc For a copy of the project description and participation information email a request to In February CAEM sponsored a meeting of the newly formed Leadership Counci l on Energy Restructuring an umbrella group of industry executives and publi c sector officials who support the development of a coherent strategy on energy restructuring Leadership Council Document In April CAEM filed comments with the FTC on the proceeding that wasinitiatedat the request of House Energy and Commerce Committee Chairma n Billy Tauzin on the impact ofStates restructuring CAEM FTC Comments In March CAEM held its first meeting of the DISCO of the Future Forum We have posted several documents from that Forum DISCO Forum Documents Last Sunday the Philadelphia Inquirer published the views of CAEM on President Bushs Energy Plan Philadelphia Inquirer Article In January CAEM appeared on CNN to discuss the California Crisis CNN Li nk Feel free to forward this email to colleagues who may be interested in the Centers activities For other information and documents please visit o ur website at Please let us know if we can be of assistance to you in your efforts on energy restructuring If you do not wish to receive updates on CAEMs Activity please reply w ith the word remove in the subject line Thank you Ken Malloy President Center for the Advancement of Energy Markets F Burke Center Parkway PMB
